definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: The team of contributors is generally responsible for the project area and everything in it.
sentences.chinese: 貢獻者組成的團隊一般負責該項目區域和其中的一切。

sentences.english: This article clarifies the value of governance to application development teams.
sentences.chinese: 本文會嚮應用程序開發團隊闡明治理的價值。

sentences.english: Gibson has interviewed people to understand how they  conceptualize teams.
sentences.chinese: 吉布森調查了人們對於“團隊合作”這一概念的認識。

sentences.english: The group doped its germanium with phosphorous, which has five outer electrons.
sentences.chinese: 這個團隊對鍺進行了磷原子摻雜，它含有5個電子。

sentences.english: Different teams work on the Bolivia site and the Brazil site.
sentences.chinese: 玻利維亞站點和巴西站點由不同的團隊負責。

sentences.english: Easy handle rooming list of group.
sentences.chinese: 輕鬆處理團隊客人分房。

sentences.english: He was in a new team winning six out of the first seven races.
sentences.chinese: 他在一個在七站比賽中取得了六站勝利的新團隊裏。

sentences.english: Ask how many active Scrum teams they have at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 因此要詢問他們此時有多少活躍的Scrum團隊。

sentences.english: Many charity races like Race for the Cure also have team training programs.
sentences.chinese: 許多慈善團體如賽跑會也會有團隊訓練計劃。

sentences.english: And SuYan said WenXue once knew the team energy.
sentences.chinese: 而蘇巖說溫雪曾經認識到了團隊精力。

sentences.english: The key to success for Otis is team-work spirit.
sentences.chinese: 奧的斯的成敗繫於團隊精神。

sentences.english: A perfect platform for educating new team members about what the solution entails.
sentences.chinese: 對新團隊成員進行有關解決方案需求教育的完美平臺。

sentences.english: And now we know that they can organize themselves into teams to accomplish tasks.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們發現它們可以組成團隊以共同完成任務。

sentences.english: A low attrition rate for good team members is a sign of success.
sentences.chinese: 對於好的團隊成員的低消耗時成功的信號。

sentences.english: High performing teams do an excellent job of "on-boarding" the new team member(s).
sentences.chinese: 高績效團隊在幫助新人融入方面也做得很出色。

sentences.english: These are essential for any team, distributed or co-located.
sentences.chinese: 這些對任何團隊，分佈的或集中的，都是必要的。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
